travelogues.title: Journey Through the Alps
travelogues.longDescription: Experience the beauty and serenity of the majestic Alps.

travelogues.title: Discovering Bali
travelogues.longDescription: Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and stunning landscapes of Bali.
